event.description: Marco Scutaro singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Aaron Hill grounds into a force out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to second baseman Adam Kennedy. Marco Scutaro out at 2nd. Aaron Hill to 1st.
Alex Rios flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Vernon Wells singles on a sharp line drive to second baseman Adam Kennedy, deflected by pitcher Dallas Braden. Aaron Hill to 2nd.
Adam Lind singles on a line drive to right fielder Jack Cust. Aaron Hill to 3rd. Vernon Wells to 2nd.
Scott Rolen grounds into a force out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to second baseman Adam Kennedy. Adam Lind out at 2nd.
Kevin Millar flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Rod Barajas pops out to shortstop Orlando Cabrera.
Jose Bautista singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, second baseman Adam Kennedy to first baseman Bobby Crosby.
Aaron Hill flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Alex Rios homers (3) on a fly ball to left field.
Vernon Wells strikes out swinging.
Adam Lind grounds out to first baseman Bobby Crosby.
Scott Rolen grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Bobby Crosby.

Alex Rios out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Jose Bautista scores. Marco Scutaro to 3rd. Aaron Hill to 2nd.
